tool_description: Executes configurable business rules against transaction data to identify policy violations and suspicious patterns.

transaction_data.description: Transaction data fields as key-value pairs

rule_set_id.description: Identifier for the rule set to execute

rule_priority.description: Rule execution priority (LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH, ALL)

stop_on_first_violation.description: Whether to stop execution after first rule violation

error_messages: Invalid rule set: The specified rule_set_id does not exist
Invalid rule priority: Use one of [LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH, ALL]
Transaction data format error: Provide data as array of 'key=value' strings
Rule execution failed: One or more rules failed to execute properly
usage: Provide transaction_data as array of 'field=value' strings and specify rule_set_id. Configure rule_priority and stop_on_first_violation as needed.

violated_rules.description: List of rule names that were violated

rule_scores.description: Severity scores for each violated rule

overall_risk.description: Overall risk level based on rule violations
